product_name: Casio G-Shock Digital Vibration Watch - Men's
long_description: Built for precision and stealth, the G-Shock watch boasts silent vibrating alarms and an easy-to-read display that auto-illuminates when tilted for smooth operation during any outdoor fitness mission.
short_description: Built for precision and stealth, the G-Shock watch boasts silent vibrating alarms and an easy-to-read display that auto-illuminates when tilted for smooth operation during any outdoor fitness mission.
